mapper.update:
update DS_APP_REPORT
SysNo = #{sysno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brrowNum = #{brrownum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
penalty = #{penalty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
penaltyInterest = #{penaltyinterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isSettle = #{issettle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusQuota = #{surplusquota,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusMoney = #{surplusmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusInterest = #{surplusinterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusPenalty = #{surpluspenalty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surplusPenaltyInteres = #{surpluspenaltyinteres,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actRepayDate = #{actrepaydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
borrStatus = #{borrstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planRepay = #{planrepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actRepayAmount = #{actrepayamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
InDate = #{indate,jdbcType=DATE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update DS_APP_REPORT set SysNo = #{sysno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brrowNum = #{brrownum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, penalty = #{penalty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, penaltyInterest = #{penaltyinterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSettle = #{issettle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surplusQuota = #{surplusquota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surplusMoney = #{surplusmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surplusInterest = #{surplusinterest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surplusPenalty = #{surpluspenalty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surplusPenaltyInteres = #{surpluspenaltyinteres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actRepayDate = #{actrepaydate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, borrStatus = #{borrstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planRepay = #{planrepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actRepayAmount = #{actrepayamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, InDate = #{indate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT dar.* FROM DS_APP_REPORT dar, ym_borrow_list ybl WHERE dar.brrowNum = ybl.borr_num AND dar.status=0 AND (ybl.borr_status = 'BS006' OR ybl.borr_status ='BS010')

SELECT * FROM DS_APP_REPORT dar , ym_borrow_list ybl WHERE dar.status = 0 AND dar.borrStatus=ybl.borr_status AND (( ybl.borr_status ='BS005' AND dar.borrStatus='BS004' ) OR ( ybl.borr_status ='BS010' AND dar.borrStatus='BS005' ) OR ( ybl.borr_status ='BS006' AND dar.borrStatus='BS004' ) )
